Body:
Im trying to send data from my Arduino Uno via GSM network to Azure IoT hub. Im using SIM800 GSM module with static IP microSIM card. My question is: how can I connect my device and send data to Azure IoT hub? If you can, please provide example for connection part.

I have already created personal Azure IoT hub. I have already registered new device and downloaded Device Explorer app for Windows. I have downloaded Arduino IDE app for Windows.

Take as look at https://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/2e603893-6186-4a2b-ba59-f06e86938aa3/arduino-gsm-connection-to-azure-iot-hub?forum=azureiothub and https://github.com/Azure/connectthedots and see if it helps.
